sub_title: GLOBAL ACCOUNT MANAGER | SUPPLY CHAIN & LOGISTICS | BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT | MBA
summary:
Internationally mobile. I am a results-driven Global Account Manager in Supply Chain & Logistics with extensive international experience. I have lived and worked in China, Italy, Germany, and Singapore. My commercial competencies are underpinned with strong analytical & structured thinking skills gained from Management Consulting, Corporate Strategy and an international MBA degree. 

I build effective relationships with internal and external stakeholders in complex multi-dimensional corporate structures to develop profitable businesses. Internally, I manage a virtual team spreading out in 20+ geographies and in multiple business divisions and I establish senior management sponsorship for my customers. Externally, I manage 2 conglomerate accounts with revenue portfolio of EUR 190 million a year. 

In 2 years, I have increased revenue by 7% CAGR & improved customer satisfaction by 11%. 

What sets me apart is my unique mix of experiences and skills.
•	I am a commercial manager with a background in management consulting. I’m strong in both relationship building and analytical thinking. 
•	I am a cultural hybrid between Asia and Europe. I understand well about doing business across continents.

I am open to explore new opportunities. If you find my profile of value, please get in touch at rui.wang.sh@gmail.com.
